
.. _scatter_tooltip:


Scatter Plot With Tooltips
==========================
A scatter-plot with tooltip labels on hover.  Hover over the points to see
the point labels.
Use the toolbar buttons at the bottom-right of the plot to enable zooming
and panning, and to reset the view.


.. raw:: html
    
    
    <style>
    
    </style>
    
    <div id="fig_el102014372112720651538524"></div>
    <script>
    function mpld3_load_lib(url, callback){
      var s = document.createElement('script');
      s.src = url;
      s.async = true;
      s.onreadystatechange = s.onload = callback;
      s.onerror = function(){console.warn("failed to load library " + url);};
      document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(s);
    }

**Python source code:** :download:`[download source: scatter_tooltip.py]<scatter_tooltip.py>`

.. literalinclude:: scatter_tooltip.py
    :lines: 9-
